plugin.name: maximumize
plugin.long: Maximumizes windows (resize them to fit the available screenspace).

option.name: ignore_sticky
option.short: Ignore sticky windows in the calculations
option.long: Treat sticky windows as non-existant when calculating space to use for the maximumize window.

option.name: ignore_overlapping
option.short: Ignore already overlapping windows in the calculations
option.long: Treat windows that are already overlapping with the current window as non-existant when calculating space to use for the maximumize window.

option.name: allow_shrink
option.short: Permit windows to shrink during maximumize
option.long: This allows a window to change it's shape to fit in an area even when the new shape might be smaller than it's current size with regards to area

option.name: maximumize_left
option.long: When maximumizing, allow the window to grow to the left.

option.name: maximumize_right
option.long: When maximumizing, allow the window to grow to the right.

option.name: maximumize_up
option.long: When maximumizing, allow the window to grow upwards.

option.name: maximumize_down
option.long: When maximumizing, allow the window to grow downwards.

option.name: trigger_max_key
option.long: Trigger a resize of the window currently focused so it fits as much of the available screenspae as possible.

option.name: trigger_max_left
option.long: Grow the window leftwards as much as possible.

option.name: trigger_max_right
option.long: Grow the window rightwards as much as possible.

option.name: trigger_max_up
option.long: Grow the window upwards as much as possible.

option.name: trigger_max_down
option.long: Grow the window downwards as much as possible.

option.name: trigger_max_horizontally
option.long: Grow the window horizontally as much as possible.

option.name: trigger_max_vertically
option.long: Grow the window vertically as much as possible.

option.name: trigger_max_up_left
option.long: Grow upper left corner of a window as much as possible.

option.name: trigger_max_up_right
option.long: Grow upper right corner of a window as much as possible.

option.name: trigger_max_down_left
option.long: Grow lower left corner of a window as much as possible.

option.name: trigger_max_down_right
option.long: Grow lower right corner of a window as much as possible.

option.name: trigger_min_key
option.long: Trigger a resize of the window currently focused so it resizes to 1/4 size.

option.name: trigger_min_left
option.long: Shrink the window leftwards.

option.name: trigger_min_right
option.long: Shrink the window rightwards.

option.name: trigger_min_up
option.long: Shrink the window upwards.

option.name: trigger_min_down
option.long: Shrink the window downwards.

option.name: trigger_min_horizontally
option.long: Shrink the window horizontally.

option.name: trigger_min_vertically
option.long: Shrink the window vertically.

option.name: trigger_min_up_left
option.long: Shrink upper left corner of a the window.

option.name: trigger_min_up_right
option.long: Shrink upper right corner of a the window.

option.name: trigger_min_down_left
option.long: Shrink lower left corner of a the window.

option.name: trigger_min_down_right
option.long: Shrink lower right corner of a the window.
